	<style>	
	
html {
  background-color: #f3f3f3;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

body {
	background-color: #f9f8f0; 	margin: 0;

	font-weight:normal;
}

a {

	font-weight:bold; }
	
ul {

}

	text-align: center;

}

		background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,');

	}
	
	

.wrapper {
	margin: 0 auto;

	padding: 0 20px;
}

	padding: 0;
}	
}

.wrapper-navbar {

}

	background-position: 0 0;
	background-size: contain;
}


.icon-search { background-image: url(/src/icon-search.svg); }

.header {
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	background-color:#111;color:#fff;
	padding-bottom:1em;margin-bottom:5em;	
}

.header-map {
	display:none; 	width: 100%;
	height: 600px;
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	z-index: 1;
}


.header-map::after {
	content: "";
	display: block;
	position: absolute;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	background: url(/src/map-fade.png) repeat-x 0 0/contain;
}

.header-text {
	position: relative;
	z-index: 9;
	text-align: center;
	font-size: 32px;
			margin-top: 0;
	padding-top: 2em;
	padding-bottom: 1.5em;
	margin-bottom: 0;
}
	
.header-subtitle {
	font-weight: normal;
		font-size: initial;
    font-weight: normal;
    max-width: 800px;
    display: inline-block;
    line-height: 2em;
	padding:3em 1em;
	text-align: justify;text-align-last: center;}
	
.header_dates {text-align:center;position:relative;margin:0 20px;padding:20px 0;display:block;z-index:2;font-size:initial;}
	
.wrapper-start-header {
	position: relative;
	z-index: 1000;
}


.start-search-wrapper {
	position: relative;
	display: block;
	border-radius: 100px;
	box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(30,0,63,0.20), 0 5px 12px rgba(30,0,63,0.07);
	background-color: #fff;
	padding: 10px 50px;
	font-size: 18px;
	max-width: 60%;
	margin: 0 auto 120px;
}

.start-search {
	font-family: inherit;
	border: 0;
	width: 100%;
	font-size: inherit;
}

.start-search:focus {
	outline: 0;
}

.start-search-wrapper .icon-search {
	position: absolute;
	left: 20px;
	top: 30%;
}

.start-search-go {
	text-decoration: none;
	color: #1a5b92;
	position: absolute;
	right: 20px;
	top: 28%;
	font-size:19px;
	line-height:19px;
}


.header-items {
	display: block;
	font-size: 2em;
	padding:0 10px;
	margin-top:0.4em;
	margin-bottom:0;
	text-shadow:0 0 5px #333;
}

	
@media (max-width: 800px) {
	.floating_controls_bottom_mobile {
		bottom:5px !important;	
		top:unset !important;
	}	
}		

@media all and (max-width: 800px) {

		font-size: 24px;
		padding-bottom: 3em;
	}

	}

	margin-top:3em;	
	}
}

@media all and (max-width: 660px) {

	}	
}

	}

	text-align:center;text-align-last:center;	}
}

@media all and (max-width: 400px) {

		font-size: 17px;
	}	
	
@media all and (max-width: 350px) {
	.header .header-text {
		font-size: 16px;
		padding-top: 2em;
	}		
}
	
	}

/* Article styles */

.article {
		padding: 30px 0;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	font-size: 1em;
	line-height: 2em;
	z-index: 9;
	margin-bottom:100px;
}

.article::after {
    content:"";
    display:block;
    clear:both;
}

.article-content {
	box-sizing: border-box;
	position: relative;
}

@media all and (min-width: 800px) {
	.article-content {
		min-height:1000px;
	}
}

@media all and (max-width: 800px) {
	.article-content {
		border-bottom: 1px solid #e5e5e5;
		padding-bottom: 3em;
	}
}

.article-content p,.article-content ul,.article-content .like_p {
	margin-left: 1em;margin-right: 1em;
		padding-left: 0;
	min-width:51%;
}

@media all and (max-width: 500px) {
	.article-content p,.article-content ul,.article-content .like_p {
	margin-left: 1em;
	margin-right: 1em;
}
}
	
.like_p a {display:inline-block;}

.like_p svg,#load_more_hotels svg,ul svg {height:1em;width:1em;fill:#1a5b92;position:relative;top:0.1em;margin-left:5px;}
.searchoption svg {fill:#fff;}	
	
.suggest_button svg {stroke: white;fill:none;width:8px;height:12px;stroke-width:3;stroke-linecap:round;margin-left:9px;}
	
	
.like_p_2 {display:none;}

.speech_bubble {background:#ebdecc;color:#000;display:table;padding:10px 15px;border-radius:10px;word-break: break-word;}	
	
.header .speech_bubble {background:#f9f9f9;}	
	
.speech_bubble_v2 {padding: 10px 15px 10px 55px ;margin-left: 40px;}		
	
.speech_bubble a { } 	
	.promo_code {/*border-radius:10px;box-shadow:1px 1px 1px #000;*/width:500px;background:#eee;margin-bottom:30px;}
	.promo_code:hover {background:#fff6eb;box-shadow:1px 1px 5px #999;}
	.promo_code_used:hover {background:#eee;box-shadow:1px 1px 6px #bbb;}
	.promo_code_inner {font-weight:normal;color:#000;}
	.promo_code_left {padding:40px 10px 10px 10px;float:left;width:140px;background:#1ea15c;/*border-radius:10px 0 0 10px;*/color:#fff;height:130px;text-align:center;font-weight:bold;font-size:30px;}
	.promo_code_used .promo_code_left {background:#e96d6d;}
	.promo_code_right {padding:15px 0 15px 15px;float:left;width:300px;}
	.promo_use_code {font-size:12px;background:#27764d;padding:5px 10px;margin-top:50px;border-radius:5px;text-transform:uppercase;}
	.promo_code_used .promo_use_code {background:#b75454;}
	.promo_checkmark {font-weight:bold;padding:4px 7px 4px 5px;border-radius:20px;background:#1ea15d;color:#fff;font-size: 10px;position:relative;bottom:2px;}
	.promo_code_verified {font-style:italic;font-size:14px;color:#333;}
	.promo_code_used .promo_checkmark {display:none;}
	.promo_code_activate {color:#00559b;font-weight:bold;}
	.promo_code_activate span:hover {text-decoration:underline;}
	.promo_code_used .promo_code_activate {color:#000;font-weight:normal;}
	.promo_code_used .promo_code_activate span:hover {text-decoration:none;}
	.promo_code_text {padding:15px 0;}
	.promo_code_thumbs {float:right;}
	.promo_code_thumbs span {padding-left:10px;}
	.promo_code_used .promo_code_text,.promo_code_used .promo_use_discount,.promo_code_used .promo_code_activate {text-decoration:line-through;}
	
@media all and (max-width: 600px) {
	.promo_code {width:100%;}
	.promo_use_discount {float:left;padding:4px 0 0 4px;}
	.promo_use_code {float:right;margin-top:auto;padding:5px 20px;}
	.promo_code_left {width:calc(100% - 20px);padding:10px;border-radius:10px 10px 0 0;height:auto;}
	.promo_code_right {width:auto;padding-top:25px;}
	.promo_code_thumbs {padding:40px 15px 0 0;}
}
	

.article-content h2,.article-content h3 {
	margin-top: 1.5em;
	margin-left: 0.65em;	margin-bottom: 1.5em;
	margin-right:1em;
	font-family:Futura-Medium,Futura,"Lucida Grande",Segoe UI,Calibri,"serif",Roboto;
}

@media all and (max-width: 500px) {
	.article-content h2,.article-content h3 {
	margin-left: 0.65em;
}
}
	
.h_num {font-family:arial;padding: 6px 5px 6px 5px;min-width: 33px;background: #111;display: inline-block;border-radius: 30px;text-align: center;margin-right: 5px;color: #fff;}

.h_link {text-decoration:none;color:#000;line-height:1.7em;font-family:Futura-Medium,Futura,"Lucida Grande",Segoe UI,Calibri,"serif",Roboto;}
	
.h_link:hover {text-decoration:underline;}

.article-image-row {
	display: block;
	width: 100%;
	overflow: hidden;
	margin-bottom: 1.5em;
	background:#FFF;
	position: relative;
	border-radius: 15px; }
	
@media all and (max-width: 500px) {
	.article-image-row {
	margin: 0 1em 1.5em 1em;
	width:calc(100% - 2em);
}
}
	
.article-image-row img:hover, .count_wrapper:hover {opacity: 0.90;filter: alpha(opacity=90);}
	
	
	
.article_image_1 {width:66.6%;float:left;cursor: pointer;}
.article_image_2 {width:33.3%;float:left;cursor: pointer;}
.article_image_3 {width:33.3%;float:left;cursor: pointer;}
	
.count_wrapper {
 position: absolute;
 bottom: 0;
 right: 1px;
 width: 33.3%;
 height: 50%;
 background:rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
 cursor: pointer;	
}
	
.count_wrapper_smaller { height:100% !important;}
.article_image_1_smaller {width:33.3% !important;}

@media all and (max-width: 500px) {
.article_image_1_smaller {display:none;}
}
	
.count_text {
position: absolute;
top: 50%;
left: 50%;
-webkit-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
-moz-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
-ms-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
-o-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
color: #fff;
text-decoration: none;
font-size: 40px;
font-weight: bold;
font-family:sans-serif;
text-shadow: 1px 1px 45px #000;
text-align:center;
line-height:18px;
padding:25%;
cursor: pointer;
}
	
.count_text span {
font-size: 20px;
color: #eee;		
}

@media all and (max-width: 500px) {
.article_image_1 { width:100%;float:left;}
.article_image_2, .article_image_3 { width:50%;float:left;}
.count_wrapper {width:50%;height:33.3%;}
}
	
.article-metadata {
	margin-top: 1em;
	padding-bottom: 3em;
	padding-right: 1em;
	padding-left: 1em;
		position: relative;
}

@media all and (max-width: 500px) {
.article-metadata {
	padding-left:1em;
}
}

.article-metadata::after {
	content: "";
	display: block;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 0;
	left: 0;
	background-color: #e5e5e5;
	height: 1px;
	width: 200px;
}

.article-content .article-metadata-cell {
	display: inline-block;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	padding-right: 20px;
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
	background-size: contain;
	color: inherit;
}

	.article-content .article-metadata-cell span {
	font-weight: bold;
}
	

.article-section-secondary {
	position: relative;
		padding-top: 0.5em;
	padding-bottom: 1.5em;
		padding-right: 3em;
	padding-left: 3em;
	line-height: 1.8em;
}

@media all and (max-width: 500px) {
	.article-section-secondary {
	padding-left: 1em;
	padding-right: 1em;
	padding-bottom:1.5em;
}
}
	
@media all and (min-width: 800px) {
	.sticky {
	  float:right;
	  width:29.9%;
	  box-sizing: border-box;
	  position: -webkit-sticky;
	  position: sticky;
	  top: 0;
}
	.sticky .article-section-secondary {width:100% !important;}
}

.article-section-secondary p:last-child {
	margin-bottom: 0;
}

.article-section-secondary::after {
	content: "";
	display: block;
	position: absolute;
	left: 5%;
	right: 0;
	bottom: 0;
	width: 90%;
	height: 1px;
	}

@media all and (max-width: 800px) {
	.article-section-secondary:last-child::after {
		display: none;
	}
}

.article-author {
	margin-top: -115px;
	position: relative;
	margin-bottom: 1em;
}
	
.article-author-nohop {
	margin-top: 0 !important;	
}

/* Desktop styles */
@media all and (min-width: 800px) {
	.article-content {
		width: 70%;
		float: left;
	}
	
	.article-content::after {
		content: "";
		display: block;
		position: absolute;
		top: 0;
		right: 0;
		width: 1px;
		height: 100%; 
			}

	.article-section-secondary {
		float: right;
		width: 29.9%;
		box-sizing: border-box;
		
	}
	
	.article-section-secondary::after {
		left: 15%;
		width: 70%;
	}
	
	.article-author {
				 	 float: none;
    width: auto;
    box-sizing: border-box;
	}
}
/* End desktop styles */
	
@media all and (max-width: 500px) {
	.article-author {
	margin-bottom:3em;
	}
}
	

.article-author-image {
	border-radius: 100px;
	border: 5px solid #fff;
	position:absolute;
	right:50%;
}
	
.article-author-image-first {border-radius:100px;height:100px;width:100px;margin-right:15px;float:left;}
.article-author-image-first-v2 {height:80px;width:80px;position:absolute;border:4px solid #fff;margin-top:20px;margin-left:-4px;}
	
.article-author-image-first span	{width:20px;height:20px;background:#ebdecc;transform: rotate(45deg);z-index:-1;display:inline-block;position:relative;top:15px;left:106px;}
	
.header .article-author-image-first span {display:none;}
	
.article-author-image-first img {width:100px;height:100px;position:relative;top:-32px;}
	
.article-author-message {padding-top:90px;line-height:1.7em;padding-left:20px;padding-right:20px;
		}
.article-author-message img {max-width:100%;margin-bottom:1em;}



.submit,.suggest_button {
	border: 0;
	border-radius: 4px;
	color: #fff; 
	background-color: #11588d;	display: inline-block;
	font-family: inherit;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 14px;
	line-height: 14px;
	padding: 1.2em 1.2em;
	cursor: pointer;
	text-decoration:none;
	min-width:165px;
	text-align:center;
	
}
	

@media all and (max-width: 800px) {
	.submit,.suggest_button {
		
	width: calc(100% - 2.6em);
		}
}

@media all and (max-width: 500px) {

	font-size: 1.05em;
	}
}
	
	
.pswp .suggest_button {
	margin-bottom: 2em;
}
	
	.b_rooms {margin-top:2em;margin-right:1em;border:1px solid #fff;}
	/* OLD: .b_readmore {margin-top:2em;margin-right:0.7em;background:#333;border:1px solid #fff;} */
	.b_readmore {margin-top:2em;margin-right:0.7em;background:#ddd;border:1px solid transparent;text-decoration:underline;color:#000;}
	
	.b_readmore_green {margin-top:2em;margin-right:0.7em;background:#11588d;border:1px solid #fff;}
	
	.b_rooms:hover,.b_readmore:hover,.b_readmore_green:hover {background-image: linear-gradient(rgb(0 0 0/10%) 0 0);text-decoration: underline;}
	
@media all and (max-width: 500px) {
	.b_rooms {margin-top:1.5em;margin-right:0.1em;}
	.b_readmore,.b_readmore_green {margin-top:1.5em;margin-right:0;}
}

/* End of article styles */

/* More content */

.section-header {
	text-align: center;
	margin-top: 0;
	margin-bottom: 2em;
}

.recommendations {
	position: relative;
	z-index: 1;
}

.recommendations-list::after {
	content:"";
	display:block;
	clear:both;
}

	
.article-card {

	width: 31.333%;

	overflow: hidden;
	position:relative;
}	
	
.article_card_img {width:100%;min-height:150px;border-radius:15px;}	
.article_card_img:hover {opacity: 0.90;filter: alpha(opacity=90);}
	
.a-c-2 {width: 14.666%;height:44px;background:#efe6d2;border-radius:30px;box-shadow:none;}	

@media all and (max-width: 800px) {

	}

	}
	
.article-card-author-name-2 {

	width:100%;
   background:#efe6d2;

.footer_inner_2 {padding:0 20px;}

	.related_lists {margin-top:-1em;}

.awesomplete [hidden] {
    display: none;
}

.awesomplete .visually-hidden {
    position: absolute;
    clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
}

.awesomplete {
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
	 min-width:90%;
	 max-width:100%;
}

.awesomplete > input {
    display: block;
}

.awesomplete > ul {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    z-index: 1;
    min-width: 100%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    list-style: none;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    background: #fff;
}

.awesomplete > ul:empty {
    display: none;
}

.awesomplete > ul {
	border-radius: .3em;
	margin: .2em 0 0;
	background: hsla(0,0%,100%,.9);
	background: linear-gradient(to bottom right, white, hsla(0,0%,100%,.8));
	border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.3);
	box-shadow: .05em .2em .6em rgba(0,0,0,.2);
	text-shadow: none;
}

@supports (transform: scale(0)) {
	.awesomplete > ul {
		transition: .3s cubic-bezier(.4,.2,.5,1.4);
		transform-origin: 1.43em -.43em;
	}
	
	.awesomplete > ul[hidden],
	.awesomplete > ul:empty {
		opacity: 0;
		transform: scale(0);
		display: block;
		transition-timing-function: ease;
	}
}

	/* Pointer */
	.awesomplete > ul:before {
		content: "";
		position: absolute;
		top: -.43em;
		left: 1em;
		width: 0; height: 0;
		padding: .4em;
		background: white;
		border: inherit;
		border-right: 0;
		border-bottom: 0;
		-webkit-transform: rotate(45deg);
		transform: rotate(45deg);
	}

	.awesomplete > ul > li {
		position: relative;
		padding: .2em .5em;
		cursor: pointer;
		color:#000;
	}
	
	.awesomplete > ul > li:hover {
		background: hsl(200, 40%, 80%);
		color: black;
	}
	
	.awesomplete > ul > li[aria-selected="true"] {
		background: hsl(205, 40%, 40%);
		color: white;
	}
	
		.awesomplete mark {
			background: hsl(65, 100%, 50%);
		}
	
		.awesomplete li:hover mark {
			background: hsl(68, 100%, 41%);
		}
	
		.awesomplete li span {
			color:#999;
		}
		
		.awesomplete li[aria-selected="true"] mark {
			background: hsl(86, 100%, 21%);
			color: inherit;
		}

      right: calc(50% - 224px);
    }
  }

<script>
var input = document.getElementById("input_destinations");
var input_old = "xyz";
var awesomplete = new Awesomplete(input,{sort:false});
input.addEventListener("keyup", function(event){
	if(input.value!=input_old && event.keyCode!=13 ){
	var ajax = new XMLHttpRequest();
	ajax.open("GET", "/js/ajax_destinations.php?search=" + encodeURI(input.value), true);
		ajax.onload = function() {
		var result = JSON.parse(ajax.responseText);
		awesomplete.list = result;	
		if(result[0]){document.getElementById("input_destinations_slug").value = result[0].split('|')[1];}
		else{document.getElementById("input_destinations_slug").value ="";}
	};
	ajax.send();
	
	input_old=input.value;
	}
});
</script>
